game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: A mysterious clue leads you to believe that the lost artifact is hidden within a forgotten ruin deep in the jungle. Your quest is to find it and bring it back to the village elder.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You must explore the jungle and find a hidden entrance to the ancient ruins.
Once inside, you will find a puzzle that reveals the exact location of the artifact.
task.location: Ruins interior, in the central chamber
